name: Minecraft Bedrock Edition
title: A comprehensive reference for Minecraft Bedrock Edition (1.20.x) commands.

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A comprehensive reference for Minecraft Bedrock Edition (1.20.x) commands.

cards.title: Experience (/xp)
cards.body:
Adds or levels up experience.

```mcfunction
# Add 5 levels
/xp 5L @s

# Add 100 points
/xp 100 @s
```

cards.title: Time (/time)
cards.body:
Sets the world time.

```mcfunction
# Set to day
/time set day

# Set to night
/time set night

# Set specific tick
/time set 0
```

cards.title: Weather (/weather)
cards.body:
Changes the weather.

```mcfunction
# Clear weather
/weather clear

# Rain
/weather rain

# Thunderstorm
/weather thunder
```

cards.title: Gamerules (/gamerule)
cards.body:
Sets global world rules.

| Rule | Description |
| :--- | :--- |
| `keepinventory` | Keep items on death (true/false) |
| `dodaylightcycle` | Toggle sun movement (true/false) |
| `domobspawning` | Toggle mob spawning (true/false) |
| `mobgriefing` | Toggle mob destruction (true/false) |
| `doweathercycle` | Toggle weather changes (true/false) |
| `commandblockoutput` | Toggle command block chat (true/false) |
| `showcoordinates` | Show coordinates on screen (true/false) |

```mcfunction
# Enable keep inventory
/gamerule keepinventory true

# Show coordinates
/gamerule showcoordinates true
```

cards.title: Effect (/effect)
cards.body:
Manages status effects.

```mcfunction
# Give Speed II for 30 seconds
/effect @s speed 30 2

# Give Night Vision (hide particles)
/effect @s night_vision 10000 0 true

# Clear all effects
/effect @s clear
```

cards.title: Setblock (/setblock)
cards.body:
Changes a specific block.

```mcfunction
# Place a redstone block
/setblock ~ ~-1 ~ redstone_block

# Destroy block and place air
/setblock 100 64 100 air 0 destroy
```

cards.title: Enchant (/enchant)
cards.body:
Enchants the held item.

```mcfunction
# Add Sharpness V
/enchant @s sharpness 5

# Add Unbreaking III
/enchant @s unbreaking 3
```

cards.title: Locate (/locate)
cards.body:
Finds the nearest biome or structure.

```mcfunction
# Find nearest village
/locate structure village

# Find nearest ancient city
/locate structure ancient_city
```

cards.title: Kill (/kill)
cards.body:
Removes entities.

```mcfunction
# Kill yourself
/kill @s

# Kill specific entity type
/kill @e[type=zombie]
```

cards.title: Ticking Area (/tickingarea)
cards.body:
Keeps chunks loaded even when no players are nearby.

```mcfunction
# Add a ticking area (radius 4 chunks)
/tickingarea add circle ~ ~ ~ 4 MyArea

# List all areas
/tickingarea list

# Remove an area
/tickingarea remove MyArea
```
